sys_hub_action_type_definition.annotation: Load data from data source into import set
sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
This custom action allows users to quickly and easily trigger Load All Records on a data source. Data will be loaded into an import set table configured on data source level.

Input required:

  • Data source record
Output:
  • ImportSet sys_id
sys_hub_action_type_definition.name: Load Data Source into Import Set

This custom action allows users to quickly and easily trigger Load All Records on a data source. Data will be loaded into an import set table configured on data source level.
